medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment for unique identification of the Work Item Quantity Determination document name, number and function.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the dates that apply, e.g. date of valuation, date of submission, acceptance date, etc.

medi:segment.name: Authentication result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AUT, A segment used to authenticate the message by exchanging a password or some other form of identification agreed between the trading partners.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used for any textual qualification. In computer to computer exchanges, such text will require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments for quoting references and their relevant dates that are applicable to the message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment for quoting references that are applicable to this message. e.g. contract identity, operational references, determination reference number of a former message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date of references quoted in the previous RFF segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties, in coded or clear form, and their functions relevant to the Work Item Quantity Determination Message. Identification of the contractor and client parties is mandatory for the Work Item Quantity Determination Message. It is recommended that where possible only the coded form of the party ID should be specified.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment giving more specific location information of the party specified in the NAD segment e.g. internal site/building number.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment identifying the financial institution (e.g. bank) and relevant account numbers for the contractor, client and where necessary other parties.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments giving references only relevant to the specified party rather than the whole message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying the documentary requirements of the specified party.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying and providing information relating to the documents required by the party specified by the NAD.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time of the document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments giving contact details of the specific person or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department, and associated function, to whom communications should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication type and number for the contact specified in the CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments providing the quantity determination for each work item. A quantity determination can consist of several "calculation lines".

medi:segment.name: Structure identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BII, A segment to identify the item of work to which this quantity determination applies.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment giving control totals for this work item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A segment group enabling a reference for the work item.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment giving a reference for the work item within the whole project.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment giving a narrative description of the reference.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment giving a date when the reference in this segment group was related to project documentation.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A segment group giving the calculation lines and their values for the work item identified in the BII segment.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment identifying a calculation line within a work item.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment indicating how this calculation must be interpreted.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A narrative description concerning the whole work item or only the calculation given in segment group 9.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A segment group giving the details of the calculation lines.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment giving the values and factor of this calculation line.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment indicating, when necessary, mathematical signs for the values given in the QTY segment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment giving either: - the reference of an existing calculation line for this work item, identified in the BII segment, when its result is used in the current calculation line, or - when a standard formula is used, its reference number.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, Where a calculation line is not based upon a standard formula, the free and unstructured calculation and its values can be given in this segment.
